name: GuesstheAnimalGame
0:
”Alexa, open guess the animal.”
”Alexa, play guess the animal.”
”The animal is a sea turtle.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the animal
des:
You choose the difficulty level of easy, medium, or hard with this skill. A description of an animal is given. and you have to guess the correct animal.You are given four tries before the correct animal is given. If you get the animal wrong, you will be given the description again and then a hint. Once you guess the correct animal, you can hear a fact about it or play again.
This educational game is perfect for kids to learn about different animals. There are over 100 animals to guess!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
